Light Writer: This small library simply adds a better dialogue that looks similar to this. It works by simply adding a function where you call it with 2 strings like this: 

speech ("name of speaker", "what they are saying")

You have to keep the quotations if you're using a string but don't need them if you want the character to say a defined variable.
So try it out and tell me how happy it makes you to see you don't need to always format dialogue.
Feel free to edit the library so that you can change the format of the speaker and message format to your liking.
This library is designed for newbies like me
